articles.title: iPhone 16 Pro prototype is being tested with a hole-punch cutout instead of the Dynamic Island - PhoneArena
articles.description: Tipster Majin Bu says that Apple is testing an iPhone 16 Pro prototype with a hole-punch front-facing camera replacing Dynamic Island.
articles.content: Apple is testing a iPhone 16 Pro hole punch version, but it may not be finalized. Details will depend on March next year. I guess most likely we won't see such a version until the iPhone 17 pic.twitt… [+64 chars]
